archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.2.3d: d) use a consistent, trusted date and time source to ensure event logs use accurate timestamps (e.g. using the Network Time Protocol (NTP), supported by GPS, atomic clocks or approved time servers on the internet).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
